name: The Block
title: Utf8b8jome4jw The Scoop Fund Managers Are Ready To Deploy
text:
Synopsis
The crypto market is showing renewed optimism in 2025, with fund managers anticipating significant capital inflows, driven by a more crypto-friendly administration and emerging opportunities in Solana and AI-related narratives.

Key Insights
- Nearly 50% of fund managers anticipate significant capital inflows starting in Q2 2025
- Solana has gained substantial attention, with 40% of liquid fund managers most focused on the blockchain
- Trump issued a crypto executive order establishing a working group to develop a new regulatory framework for digital assets
- Nearly 50% of newly created wallets interacted with Solana for the first time during the $TRUMP memecoin launch
- AI narrative is becoming dominant in crypto, with key themes including AI agents, decentralized infrastructure, and memecoins
- Family offices, high-net-worth individuals, and fund-of-funds are actively re-engaging with crypto fund managers
- Pensions, endowments, and foundations are showing increased interest in digital assets
- Solana reached a new all-time high, increasing over 23% following the $TRUMP memecoin launch
